name: snake_python
description:
# snake_python

A simple snake game written in modern python.

Sold with full source code.

Just 305 lines. Simple codebase.

## Requirements

- Python 3.0+

- pygame 2.0+

## How To Play

`python3 snake_python.py`

## Keys

's'    - to start game

arrows - to move the snake
